text: tavada kavurun (uḍan̆gukama balāporottuven) minisunṭa penvīma san̆dahā tamangē mudal (vastūn) viyadam karamin allāhvada avasāna dinayada viśvāsa nokara siṭinnōda, (ovunvada allāh priya karannē næta. ovunṭa ṣeyitānma miturāya). kavurun haṭa ṣeyitān mitureku vaśayen siṭinnēda, ohu itāmat napuru mitureki
